attributes.long-description:
The critically acclaimed and bestselling role-playing-shooter hybrid, Borderlands 2, is now available for the PlayStation®Vita system! Stuffed with 6 Add On Packs, Borderlands 2 on PS Vita system delivers hours upon hours of signature addictive Borderlands nonstop loot-shoot gameplay.

Borderlands 2 is the sequel to the critically acclaimed shooter-looter that combined intense first-person mayhem with role-playing gameplay. The second game in the series, Borderlands 2 raises the action of the original game with an even larger and more detailed world to explore, an updated gun system, a new cast of characters and character classes, and integration of storyline with action.

• Includes 6 Add On Packs:

– Mr. Torgue’s Campaign of Carnage Add On Campaign

– Captain Scarlett and Her Pirate’s Booty Add On Campaign

– Psycho Character Class

– Mechromancer Character Class

– Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 1

– Collector’s Edition Pack

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.



1-2 player(s)
10000KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Dual Analog Sticks

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
